original_title: All Share Price Index Reaches Record High
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st);The All Share Price Index (ASPI) of the Colombo Stock Exchange (CSE) surpassed the 22,000-point mark for the fisrt time in history today.Accordingly, as of 12:00 PM today, the All Share Price Index stood at 22,057.58 points.This represents a gain of 108.39 units.
